term.title: prochirality centre

item.text: An atom of a molecule which becomes a chirality centre by replacing one of the two stereoheterotopicligands attached to it by a different ligand, e.g. C-1 of ethanol; C-3 of butan-2-ol.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2193. 'Basic terminology of stereochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2214 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122193)
